about_the_game:
Cursor & Meow is an engaging 2D game where your task is to find hidden cats in large, detailed images, drawn in a unique style. In this game, players will need to solve various puzzles and play mini-games to find all the cats. Each puzzle and mini-game adds new elements and challenges, making the search process even more interesting.

Key Features:
  • Unique Visual Style: Play on beautifully drawn levels in the style of urban sketches with many hidden details.
  • Engaging Puzzles: Solve unique puzzles to discover hidden cats.
  • Variety of Mini-Games: Play mini-games that diversify the gameplay and add extra challenges.
  • Helpful Character: he will help you in the search for seals, telling you what can be done when you click on objects, and often communicating with you, providing useful information.
  • Great Music: Enjoy relaxing melodies and harmonious ambient sounds that immerse you in the level and relax the player.
  • Optimized for Controllers: The game supports comfortable control using a controller.
  • Lots of Achievements: Collect achievements and unlock new levels and features. Achievement collectors will be pleased!



Gameplay:
In Cursor & Meow, many cats crave your attention, but not all of them will be easy to catch. To find some of them, you'll need to use a lot of concentration, dexterity, and logic! The game features numerous puzzles, challenges, and mini-games that will make your search entertaining and varied.
